website_summaries.verdict: These adult wipes are great for quickly cleaning up surfaces, handles, railings, and other germ-infected areas.
pros: Alcohol-free construction helps keep the skin supple and moisturized
Wipes are sold pre-moistened and unscented
Offered as individual disposable wipes to eliminate the risk of cross-contamination
More affordable in comparison to similar options
cons: Not very moist, so you may need to use multiple wipes at once to achieve the best-possible results

customer_reviews.title: VerSaPro AW5913
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get the poor review wrong! The sheets are excellent, but the first box I found an unknown substance on the top of the box? I think the heat may have caused it to leak!!!! I’ll try some & see if they are still usable! I will give better review if they are ok? I would have give it a 5 I changed it from 2 because I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Skip Motes

customer_reviews.title: Elder Wipes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my elderly mother who can't shower daily. They are moist but not sloppy wet. She feels much cleaner using these and they are big enough for arthritic hands to manage.
customer_reviews.author: florida native

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described. Oversized sheets perfect for cleaning of bedridden people. I used these for cleaning/washing of my husband when he was under in home hospice.
customer_reviews.author: Detour

customer_reviews.title: convenient large size
customer_reviews.text: This is a larger sizer size than the commonly available wipes. I got these for a bed-ridden patient, and they made care easier and faster.
customer_reviews.author: super mom

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: these clean wonderfully, leave skin smooth and slightly moisturized, but no sticky residue feeling. they were on drier side which i don't mind as no towel necessary to dry. wish i had known about these a long time ago. will be purchasing again when these run out. they would also be useful in times of emergency when water may be limited or not available.
customer_reviews.author: w109

customer_reviews.title: not moist dry cloths
customer_reviews.text: I used this for hygene. very dissapointed not pre moist in these packages. dry ....... nice size cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Patty from rckfrd

customer_reviews.title: Paper thin, cheap material
customer_reviews.text: You know those wipes you can buy at the dollar store that look and feel as if they're made from Styrofoam? That's what these are like.
customer_reviews.author: jmchale1959

customer_reviews.title: Easy on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Higher cost though only 1 is needed for even a big mess. Cleans well. Easy on sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: MitzyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my mother
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mother who seems pleased. I can’t give any more info as I do not use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Besyk

customer_reviews.title: Great wet wipes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, strong wet wipes. Holds up very well and is at a good price point.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Useful in the field.
customer_reviews.text: Large size. Soapy but not a lot of residue. Thanks. Use in the field for military.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great, but realize that there is no sent to the wet towel let’s
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Large and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Large wipes makes it easy for cleaning the entire body.
customer_reviews.author: Red Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Great price on an equally great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price on an equally great product. Big enough to get a hold of and sturdy enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Bob N

customer_reviews.title: Thick and moist
customer_reviews.text: Wipes are thick and well moistened. Would recommend for anyone whom cannot shower.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas B

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes
customer_reviews.text: This is the only wipe I trust to use on my non ambulatory father. I’ve been buying it consistently for about 2 years now. Def would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nice size but not very moist so needed to use too many at one time. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R. Timpf

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes that are lightly scented and modestly priced
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes that are lightly scented and modestly priced. Use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are well made and stay moist in the package. My husband is bedbound so I use a lot of wipes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

product_meta.title: VersaPro AWS913 Premium Adult Wipes, Washcloths, Pre-moistened, Enriched with Aloe & Lanolin, 9" x 13", 64/Pack
product_meta.description:
Size:AdultVersaPro Premium Adult Wipes are enriched with aloe and lanolin.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
1-800-814-5452
feature_bullets: Cleans skin when traditional washing is not possible or convenient
Individual disposable wipes eliminate the risk of cross contamination
Alcohol-free construction keeps skin supple and moisturized
Perfect for quickly cleaning up surfaces, handles, railings, and other germ-infected areas
